title: Found: PatroCleats Adapters let you try Mid-Foot cleat position without new shoes
content:
There are a few different schools of thought when it comes to cleat placement. But recently, the idea of midfoot or midsole cleat placement has become increasingly popular – particularly in the world of triathlon. More than just running your cleat back as far as they go in standard shoes, true midfoot positioning requires a […]

The post Found: PatroCleats Adapters let you try Mid-Foot cleat position without new shoes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
